H0.text: Herbivores are non-human organisms that mainly consume plants or other primary producers.

H1.text: Amphibians are nonâ€‘human organisms that mainly consume plants or other primary producers.

H2.text: Carnivores are non-human organisms that mainly consume plants/other primary producers.

H3.text: Omnivores are non-human organisms that mainly consume plants or other primary producers.

A4.text: Herbivores form an important link in the food chain because they consume plants to digest the carbohydrates photosynthetically produced by a plant.

A5.text: Carnivores in turn consume herbivores for the same reason, while omnivores can obtain their nutrients from either plants or animals.
